00031 #include <sys/wait.h> /* for waitpid() */

00048 struct host
00049 {
00050   char *name;
00051   int soc;
00052   int psoc;
00053   pid_t pid;
00054   struct host *next;
00055   struct host *prev;
00056 };
00061 static struct host *hosts = NULL;
00062 static int g_soc = -1;
00063 static int g_max_hosts = 15;
00064 
00065 
00066 static void
00067 sigchld_handler (int sig)
00068 {
00069   struct host *h = hosts;
00070   while (h != NULL)
00071     {
00072       if (h->pid != 0)
00073         {
00074           int e;
00075           do
00076             {
00077               e = waitpid (h->pid, NULL, WNOHANG);
00078             }
00079           while (e < 0 && errno == EINTR);
00080         }
00081       h = h->next;
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 static int
00087 forward (int in, int out)
00088 {
00089   static char *buf = NULL;
00090   static int bufsz = 0;
00091   int len;
00092   int type;
00093 
00094   if (internal_recv (in, &buf, &bufsz, &type) < 0)
00095     return -1;
00096 
00097   if (type & INTERNAL_COMM_MSG_TYPE_CTRL)
00098     {
00099       errno = type & ~INTERNAL_COMM_MSG_TYPE_CTRL;
00100       return -1;
00101     }
00102   else if ((type & INTERNAL_COMM_MSG_TYPE_DATA) == 0)
00103     {
00104       log_write ("hosts.c:forward(): bad msg type (%d)\n", type);
00105       return -1;
00106     }
00107 
00108   len = strlen (buf);
00109 
00110   if (out > 0)
00111     {
00112       int n;
00113       for (n = 0; n < len;)
00114         {
00115           int e;
00116           e = nsend (out, buf + n, len - n, 0);
00117           if (e < 0 && errno == EINTR)
00118             continue;
00119           else if (e <= 0)
00120             return -1;
00121           else
00122             n += e;
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126   if (bufsz > 65535)
00127     {
00128       efree (&buf);
00129       buf = NULL;
00130       bufsz = 0;
00131     }
00132 
00133   return 0;
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 static void
00138 forward_all (int in, int out)
00139 {
00140   while (forward (in, out) == 0);
00141 }
00142 
00143 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 
00145 
00146 static struct host *
00147 host_rm (struct host *hosts, struct host *h)
00148 {
00149   if (h->pid != 0)
00150     waitpid (h->pid, NULL, WNOHANG);
00151   forward_all (h->soc, g_soc);
00152 
00153   close (h->soc);
00154   if (h->psoc != 0)
00155     close (h->psoc);
00156 
00157   if (h->next != NULL)
00158     h->next->prev = h->prev;
00159 
00160   if (h->prev != NULL)
00161     h->prev->next = h->next;
00162   else
00163     hosts = h->next;
00164 
00165   efree (&h->name);
00166   efree (&h);
00167   return hosts;
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00171 
00175 static int
00176 hosts_num ()
00177 {
00178   struct host *h = hosts;
00179   int num;
00180 
00181   for (num = 0; h != NULL; num++, h = h->next);
00182 
00183   return num;
00184 }
00185 
00189 static struct host *
00190 hosts_get (char *name)
00191 {
00192   struct host *h = hosts;
00193   while (h != NULL)
00194     {
00195       if (strcmp (h->name, name) == 0)
00196         return h;
00197       h = h->next;
00198     }
00199   return NULL;
00200 }
00201 
00202 
00203 int
00204 hosts_init (int soc, int max_hosts)
00205 {
00206   g_soc = soc;
00207   g_max_hosts = max_hosts;
00208   signal (SIGCHLD, sigchld_handler);
00209   return 0;
00210 }
00211 
00212 int
00213 hosts_new (struct arglist *globals, char *name)
00214 {
00215   struct host *h;
00216   int soc[2];
00217 
00218   while (hosts_num () >= g_max_hosts)
00219     {
00220       if (hosts_read (globals) < 0)
00221         return -1;
00222     }
00223 
00224   if (socketpair (AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0, soc) < 0)
00225     return -1;
00226 
00227   h = emalloc (sizeof (struct host));
00228   h->name = estrdup (name);
00229   h->pid = 0;
00230   h->soc = soc[1];
00231   h->psoc = soc[0];
00232   if (hosts != NULL)
00233     hosts->prev = h;
00234   h->next = hosts;
00235   h->prev = NULL;
00236   hosts = h;
00237   return soc[0];
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00241 int
00242 hosts_set_pid (char *name, pid_t pid)
00243 {
00244   struct host *h = hosts_get (name);
00245   if (h == NULL)
00246     {
00247       log_write ("host_set_pid() failed!\n");
00248       return -1;
00249     }
00250 
00251   h->pid = pid;
00252   close (h->psoc);              /* Close the socket used by our son */
00253   h->psoc = 0;
00254   return 0;
00255 }
00256 
00257 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00258 int
00259 hosts_stop_host (char *name)
00260 {
00261   struct host *h = hosts_get (name);
00262   if (h == NULL)
00263     return -1;
00264 
00265   shutdown (h->soc, 2);
00266   kill (h->pid, SIGTERM);
00267   waitpid (h->pid, NULL, 0);
00268   hosts = host_rm (hosts, h);
00269   return 0;
00270 }
00271 
00272 void
00273 hosts_stop_all ()
00274 {
00275   while (hosts != NULL)
00276     {
00277       hosts_stop_host (hosts->name);
00278     }
00279 }
00280 
00281 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00282 
00286 void
00287 hosts_pause_all ()
00288 {
00289   struct host *host = hosts;
00290   while (host != NULL)
00291     {
00292       kill (host->pid, SIGUSR1);
00293       host = host->next;
00294     }
00295 }
00296 
00300 void
00301 hosts_resume_all ()
00302 {
00303   struct host *host = hosts;
00304   while (host != NULL)
00305     {
00306       kill (host->pid, SIGUSR2);
00307       host = host->next;
00308     }
00309 }
00310 
00311 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00312 
00313 static int
00314 hosts_read_data ()
00315 {
00316   fd_set rd;
00317   struct timeval tv;
00318   int max = -1;
00319   struct host *h = hosts;
00320   int e;
00321   int ret = 0;
00322 
00323   waitpid (-1, NULL, WNOHANG);
00324 
00325   if (h == NULL)
00326     return 0;
00327 
00328   FD_ZERO (&rd);
00329   while (h != NULL)
00330     {
00331       if (kill (h->pid, 0) < 0) /* Process is dead */
00332         {
00333           hosts = host_rm (hosts, h);
00334           h = hosts;
00335         }
00336       else
00337         {
00338           FD_SET (h->soc, &rd);
00339           if (h->soc > max)
00340             max = h->soc;
00341           h = h->next;
00342         }
00343     }
00344 
00345   for (;;)
00346     {
00347       tv.tv_sec = 0;
00348       tv.tv_usec = 10000;
00349       e = select (max + 1, &rd, NULL, NULL, &tv);
00350 
00351       if (e < 0 && errno == EINTR)
00352         continue;
00353       else
00354         break;
00355     }
00356 
00357   if (e <= 0)
00358     return -1;
00359 
00360   h = hosts;
00361   while (h != NULL)
00362     {
00363       if (FD_ISSET (h->soc, &rd) != 0)
00364         {
00365           if ((data_left (h->soc) != 0)
00366               && (forward (h->soc, g_soc) == 0))
00367             ret++;
00368         }
00369       h = h->next;
00370     }
00371 
00372   return ret;
00373 }
00374 
00378 static int
00379 hosts_read_client (struct arglist *globals)
00380 {
00381   struct timeval tv;
00382   int e;
00383   fd_set rd;
00384   int rsoc;
00385 
00386   if (g_soc == -1)
00387     return 0;
00388 
00389 
00390   rsoc = openvas_get_socket_from_connection (g_soc);
00391   if (rsoc == -1)
00392     return -1;
00393 
00394   FD_ZERO (&rd);
00395   FD_SET (rsoc, &rd);
00396 
00397   for (;;)
00398     {
00399       tv.tv_sec = 0;
00400       tv.tv_usec = 1000;
00401       e = select (rsoc + 1, &rd, NULL, NULL, &tv);
00402       if (e < 0 && errno == EINTR)
00403         continue;
00404       else
00405         break;
00406     }
00407 
00408   if (e > 0 && FD_ISSET (rsoc, &rd) != 0)
00409     {
00410       int f, n;
00411       char buf[4096];
00412       n = recv_line (g_soc, buf, sizeof (buf) - 1);
00413       if (n <= 0)
00414         return -1;
00415 
00416       f = ntp_parse_input (globals, buf);
00417       if (f == NTP_STOP_WHOLE_TEST)
00418         return -1;
00419       else if (f == NTP_PAUSE_WHOLE_TEST)
00420         hosts_pause_all ();
00421       else if (f == NTP_RESUME_WHOLE_TEST)
00422         hosts_resume_all ();
00423     }
00424 
00425   return 0;
00426 }
00427 
00432 int
00433 hosts_read (struct arglist *globals)
00434 {
00435   if (hosts_read_client (globals) < 0)
00436     {
00437       hosts_stop_all ();
00438       log_write ("Client abruptly closed the communication");
00439       return -1;
00440     }
00441 
00442   if (hosts == NULL)
00443     return -1;
00444 
00445   hosts_read_data ();
00446 
00447   return 0;
00448 }
